text: Maaŋ muuŋgip, guma the ana rɨman kuv bigɨn the gangip, ana bun nde suaŋv khaŋ nde suanga, “Nde wari mbevav, nde Fhe Bakɨme enseri rotur muuŋri.” Mba guma maaŋ nde suaŋrim, nde fhura ana ganɨrim, ana nde mbevɨ thari. Mba khesharigi gumgi, mbe wari won ndava vura ndɨkndɨgira zɨn vov, kha ndɨkndɨga mbui, mbe nduarira guigira ndɨkndɨgir vhuuiŋ ki.
